content:
representatives from the Gaylord Hotels Music City Bowl announced Sunday evening that Auburn University of the Southeastern Conference will be Wisconsins opponent on Dec PERIOD  in Nashville Tenn PERIOD

The thing about Auburn is they have a tradition they have a name UW head coach Barry Alvarez said Sunday PERIOD Football is important and theyve had a lot of success PERIOD Theyre always a good football team and I think our guys are excited about that PERIOD Thats a team you want to play in a bowl game. auburn finished sixth in the Southeastern Conference with a  record and completed the season  overall PERIOD The team struggled out of the gate losing their first two games including their season opener against Southern California PERIOD

The Tigers rebounded behind the play of running back Carnell Cadillac Williams who paced the team this season with  rushing yards and  touchdowns to win their next five games in a row PERIOD Two of those victories came against nationally ranked opponents Tennessee and Arkansas both of which were in the top ten at the time PERIOD

The streak ended with an overwhelming  defeat at the hands of Louisiana State on Oct PERIOD  PERIOD Auburn came up empty in losses to Ole Miss and Georgia but managed to down rival Alabama  in their annual Civil War game to end the regular season PERIOD

Our coaches and players are excited about coming to Nashville PERIOD It is a reward for a season that has been long Auburn head coach Tommy Tubberville said PERIOD It should be a fun game between two physical teams that like to run the football PERIOD They also have a great wide receiver PERIOD Were looking forward to the challenge it should be a great football game. this article was published Dec   at  am and last
updated Dec   at  am
